(2 goals each) | player = | prevseason = [[1904 Copa del Rey|1904]] | nextseason = [[1906 Copa del Rey|1906]] }} The '''Copa del Rey 1905''' was the 3rd edition of the [[Copa del Rey]]. The competition started on April 16, 1905 and concluded on April 20, 1905 with the last group stage match, in which [[Real Madrid|Madrid FC]] lifted the trophy for the first time ever with 2 victories over [[Real Sociedad|San SebastiÃ¡n Recreation Club]] and [[Athletic Bilbao]]. ==Group Stage Matches== {{footballbox | date = April 16, 1905 | team1 = [[Real Madrid|Madrid FC]] | score = 3–0 | team2 = [[Real Sociedad|San SebastiÃ¡n Recreation Club]] | stadium = [[Madrid]] }} {{footballbox | date = April 18, 1905 | team1 = [[Real Madrid|Madrid FC]] | score = 1–0 | team2 = [[Athletic Bilbao]] | stadium = [[Madrid]] }} {{footballbox | date = April 20, 1905 | team1 = [[Athletic Bilbao]] | score = not playedAthletic Bilbao, who had lost their first match of any edition of the Copa del Rey, refused to play and went back to Bilbao. San SebastiÃ¡n was declared winner of the match. | team2 = [[Real Sociedad|San SebastiÃ¡n Recreation Club]] | stadium = [[Madrid]] }} {| align=center cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" style="background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" width=40% |- bgcolor=#006699 style="color:white;" !width=34% | Teams !width=5% | Played !width=5% | Won !width=5% | Drawn !width=5% | Lost !width=5% | GF !width=5% | GA !width=5% | Pts |- align=right bgcolor=#D0E7FF |align=left|'''[[Real Madrid|Madrid FC]]''' |2||2||0||0||4||0||'''4''' |- align=right bgcolor=#F5FAFF |align=left|'''[[Real Sociedad|San SebastiÃ¡n]]''' |2||1||0||1||0||3||'''2''' |- align=right bgcolor=#F5FAFF |align=left|'''[[Athletic Bilbao]]''' |2||0||0||2||0||1||'''0''' |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; margin: 0 auto;" |- ![[Copa del Rey]] 1905 Winners |- | '''[[Real Madrid|Madrid FC]]'''
